signals.gui
Class PlottingGraphics

java.lang.Object
  signals.gui.PlottingGraphics

public class PlottingGraphics
extends java.lang.Object

Creates graphics used for plots. Currently implemented: -filled graphic -smooth graphic TODO: -stem lines -various shapes

Author:
Juliet

the graphic that can be painted using draw
